about_the_game:
Welcome to "Greyvale Rivalry" the raunchy, hilarious, and outrageously sexy visual novel where college life is just a backdrop for booze, babes, and brutal sporting smackdowns.

Ever fantasized about the wild side of college? We're talking epic parties that spill out of dorm rooms and into the streets, the kind of shenanigans that make for legendary stories (and maybe a few regrettable photos), and the electric energy of fierce rivalries on and off the field. Greyvale Rivalry throws you headfirst into all of it, with you in the driver's seat!

Imagine landing a spot on the college soccer team, only to be hilariously mistaken for a hotshot football player and causin' the biggest clash of sports teams on campus since '99. That's your life now, rookie. Get ready for awkward encounters, cultural collisions between the finesse of soccer—AKA football to the rest of the world—and the brute force of American football, and a social scene that's as cutthroat as it is tempting. You'll be navigating friendships, forging your identity, and trying to keep your head above the tide of non-stop parties, panties, and hormone-fueled drama.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game graphically contains sex and violence mature language, nudity, graphic portray of oral, vaginal, and other sexual activities.

All sexual situations are depicted as occurring between consenting adults.

This game includes adult themes and is intended for adults 18 years and older. The characters, story, and events are works of fiction and have no ties to reality.

Welcome to "Greyvale Rivalry" the raunchy, hilarious, and outrageously sexy visual novel where college life is just a backdrop for booze, babes, and brutal sporting smackdowns.

Ever fantasized about the wild side of college? We're talking epic parties that spill out of dorm rooms and into the streets, the kind of shenanigans that make for legendary stories (and maybe a few regrettable photos), and the electric energy of fierce rivalries on and off the field. That's your life now, rookie. Get ready for awkward encounters, cultural collisions between the finesse of soccer—AKA football to the rest of the world—and the brute force of American football, and a social scene that's as cutthroat as it is tempting. You'll be navigating friendships, forging your identity, and trying to keep your head above the tide of non-stop parties, panties, and hormone-fueled drama.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Greyvale Rivalry - Season 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
